name: Swiss Cheese Rapids
description:
Controls: WASD, Arrow Keys, or Controller

Grab your oar and leaf and head down to the river in this whitewater-rafting-themed endless runner. The longer you stay afloat and the more cheese you collect, the higher you'll score on the public leaderboard.

Contributors:

  • Programming and design: Deluxe and seqwalt
  • Art and design: CollyPark
  • Music and sound effects: rocktane
